revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Musician || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Meloetta. |- | Excited Child || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Thundurus and Tornadus. |- | Explorer || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || Informs the player about Mimics and the exclusive mimic in [[Relic Castle]] |- | Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || Informs the player about how to obtain [[Black DNA]] and [[White DNA]] |- | Professor Juniper|| [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Juniper's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Colress || [[P2 Laboratory]] || Challenges the player to defeat him to unlock the Rare Pok√©mon in the lab. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
